general.name: Web Content Summary

length.ultra_concise: in 100 words or less, just the essential takeaways
length.concise: briefly and concisely, focusing on key points
length.detailed: with comprehensive detail and supporting information
length.exhaustive: with maximum depth, exploring all aspects thoroughly

style.narrative: as a flowing story with clear structure. Begin with an introduction to what this content is about. Present the main ideas in a cohesive manner, connecting concepts toward key conclusions. End with a summary that ties everything together.
style.bulletPoints:

‚Ä¢ KEY POINTS: The most important information
‚Ä¢ SUPPORTING DETAILS: Relevant evidence and examples
‚Ä¢ CONCLUSIONS: Main takeaways and implications
style.analytical:
with critical analysis. Include these sections:
1. PRIMARY FOCUS: Main subject/thesis
2. KEY COMPONENTS: Analysis of major elements
3. PATTERNS & RELATIONSHIPS: Connections between ideas
4. CRITICAL EVALUATION: Strengths and limitations
5. IMPLICATIONS: Broader significance and takeaways
style.executive:
as an executive summary with actionable insights. Include:
- SITUATION: Brief context of the content
- CHALLENGE/OPPORTUNITY: What problem or opportunity is addressed
- SOLUTION/APPROACH: How the content addresses it
- OUTCOME/TAKEAWAY: What readers should learn or do

typeSpecificInstructions.default:
## CRITICAL CITATION FORMAT REQUIREMENTS

COMMENT CITATION FORMAT: For EACH significant comment or perspective, you MUST use EXACTLY this format: "Exact comment quote" - u/username (X points) [(link)](full comment URL)

Example: "This explanation really helped me understand the concept" - u/username (169 points) [(link)](https://www.reddit.com/r/SubredditName/comments/abc123/comment/def456/)

IMPORTANT: Maintain this exact format for ALL comment references. This enables proper linking and attribution in the extension.
